name: Salesforce Agentforce
key_features: Native Salesforce integration across CRM applications
Einstein Trust Layer for security and governance
Autonomous workflow execution with human handoff
Customizable actions via Flow and Apex
supported_models: Bring-your-own models such as OpenAI and Anthropic
pricing_model: Enterprise licensing through Salesforce Einstein 1 platform
description: Salesforce Agentforce is a generative AI platform in the Einstein 1 ecosystem that lets companies build trusted agents to automate CRM and customer service workflows, using the Einstein Trust Layer for secure data access and customization through Flow and Apex.
